setting.location: Grand neoclassical theater in Warsaw, Congress Poland, private aristocratic viewing box with red velvet interior

characters.appearance: Stunning young woman in her early 20s, golden blonde hair in elaborate updo, porcelain skin, delicate features, blue eyes
characters.clothing: Exquisite ball gown of pale blue silk with off-shoulder neckline, pearl necklace, long white gloves, jeweled hair combs
characters.position: Seated in red velvet theater box, holding opera glasses
characters.action: Languidly surveying the theater audience below through opera glasses

characters.appearance: Distinguished older man in his 50s, grey hair and mustache, aristocratic bearing despite slight stoop
characters.clothing: Formal evening tailcoat with white bow tie, decorative medals on lapel, white gloves
characters.position: Standing behind the young woman's chair
characters.action: Leaning forward to whisper observations about other theater patrons

scene.mainElements: Opulent theater box with red velvet and gold details, aristocratic father and daughter observing the audience before performance, crystal chandeliers illuminating the grand theater
scene.details: Gilt molding on box edges, red velvet curtains with gold tassels, other filled theater boxes visible across the space, orchestra pit below with musicians tuning instruments, elaborate ceiling frescoes, ladies with fans and gentlemen in evening wear throughout audience, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Multiple tiers of theater boxes curving around the space, massive crystal chandelier hanging from painted ceiling, stage with closed burgundy curtain
scene.atmosphere: Refined pre-performance anticipation, social display and observation among Warsaw's elite

composition.cameraAngle: View from within the box looking out at both occupants and theater
composition.focus: The beautiful young woman's detached observation of society below
composition.depth: Theater box occupants in foreground, audience and other boxes in middle, stage and chandelier in background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
